name: react-native-emoji-menu
description: A simple emoji picker for React Native and Expo. It's built with TypeScript and uses Reanimated 2 for smooth animations.
author: Majed Al-Otaibi <majedbinobied@gmail.com>

scripts.dev: rm -rf dist && rm -rf react-native-emoji-menu-*.tgz && tsup && npm pack && cd example && npm uninstall react-native-emoji-menu && npm install ../react-native-emoji-menu-*.tgz && npm run ios
